components.name: Multi-Column Testimonial Grid
components.description: Professional testimonial grid layout with multiple customer testimonials in cards or columns
components.styleNotes: Multi-column grid layout with card-based testimonials - provides strong social proof with multiple customer voices.

components.name: Minimal Customer Testimonial
components.description: Clean, centered testimonial with quote text and customer details (avatar, name, role)
components.styleNotes: Minimal, centered design with large quote text and clean customer attribution - works well with all themes.

components.name: Single Testimonial with Rating
components.description: Centered single testimonial with quote, customer avatar, name, position, star rating, and navigation dots - perfect for testimonial carousels
components.styleNotes: Centered testimonial with star rating and navigation elements - includes carousel functionality with professional customer attribution.

components.name: Aceternity Infinite Moving Cards
components.description: Dynamic infinite scrolling cards component with smooth animations and continuous movement - perfect for testimonials, social proof, or content showcases that need continuous engagement
components.styleNotes: Advanced infinite scrolling component with smooth animations and continuous movement - ideal for testimonials, social proof displays, and engaging content carousels.

components.name: Aceternity Animated Testimonials
components.description: Advanced animated testimonials component with smooth transitions, dynamic effects, and interactive elements - perfect for engaging customer testimonial displays with modern animations
components.styleNotes: Advanced animated testimonials with smooth transitions and dynamic effects - ideal for creating engaging social proof displays with modern interactive animations.
